artists.name: Taylor Swift
artists.description: Taylor Swift is an American singer-songwriter known for her narrative songwriting and genre-spanning discography, from country beginnings to pop and indie folk.

artists.name: Halsey
artists.description: Halsey is an American singer-songwriter known for her confessional lyrics and genre-blending style, spanning pop, alternative, and electronic influences.

artists.name: The Killers
artists.description: The Killers are an American rock band from Las Vegas, famous for hits like 'Mr. Brightside' and their energetic live performances.

artists.name: Thirty Seconds to Mars
artists.description: Thirty Seconds to Mars is an American rock band led by Jared Leto, known for their cinematic sound and powerful live shows.

artists.name: Breaking Benjamin
artists.description: Breaking Benjamin is an American rock band recognized for their heavy riffs and emotional lyrics, with a loyal fan base in alternative and metal scenes.

artists.name: Khalid
artists.description: Khalid is an American singer-songwriter known for his soulful voice and hits like 'Location' and 'Young Dumb & Broke'.

artists.name: Paramore
artists.description: Paramore is an American rock band fronted by Hayley Williams, known for their energetic pop-punk sound and hits like 'Misery Business' and 'Still Into You'.

artists.name: Fall Out Boy
artists.description: Fall Out Boy is an American rock band from Chicago, blending pop-punk and emo with mainstream success through songs like 'Sugar, We're Goin Down' and 'Centuries'.

artists.name: Panic! At The Disco
artists.description: Panic! At The Disco was formed in Las Vegas and became known for theatrical pop-rock hits like 'I Write Sins Not Tragedies' and 'High Hopes'.

artists.name: Duke Dumont
artists.description: Duke Dumont is a British DJ and producer, best known for deep house tracks like 'Ocean Drive' and 'Need U (100%)'.

artists.name: The Neighbourhood
artists.description: The Neighbourhood is an American alternative band known for their moody, atmospheric sound and the hit single 'Sweater Weather'.

artists.name: Yellowcard
artists.description: Yellowcard was an American pop punk band best known for their energetic sound and violin-driven melodies, with hits like 'Ocean Avenue'.

artists.name: Two Door Cinema Club
artists.description: Two Door Cinema Club is a Northern Irish indie rock band known for their upbeat, danceable tracks like 'What You Know' and 'Undercover Martyn'.

artists.name: Good Charlotte
artists.description: Good Charlotte is an American pop punk band led by Joel and Benji Madden, known for hits like 'Lifestyles of the Rich & Famous'.

artists.name: The Used
artists.description: The Used is an American rock band from Utah, recognized for their emotional lyrics and post-hardcore sound, with songs like 'The Taste of Ink'.

artists.name: Bring Me The Horizon
artists.description: Bring Me The Horizon is a British rock band that evolved from deathcore roots into a diverse alternative sound, known for songs like 'Drown' and 'Can You Feel My Heart'.

artists.name: 3OH!3
artists.description: 3OH!3 is an American electronic duo from Colorado, known for their humorous and energetic style with hits like 'Don't Trust Me' and 'Starstrukk'.

artists.name: A Day to Remember
artists.description: A Day to Remember is an American band blending metalcore and pop punk, famous for songs like 'If It Means a Lot to You' and 'The Downfall of Us All'.

artists.name: Linkin Park
artists.description: Linkin Park is an American rock band known for their fusion of nu metal and rap rock, with iconic albums like 'Hybrid Theory' and 'Meteora'.

artists.name: Neon Trees
artists.description: Neon Trees is an American rock band from Utah, recognized for their catchy pop-rock hits like 'Animal' and 'Everybody Talks'.

artists.name: Rise Against
artists.description: Rise Against is an American punk rock band known for their politically charged lyrics and songs like 'Savior' and 'Prayer of the Refugee'.

artists.name: AFI
artists.description: AFI (A Fire Inside) is an American rock band known for their dark aesthetic and blend of punk, gothic, and alternative influences, with hits like 'Miss Murder'.

artists.name: The Kooks
artists.description: The Kooks are a British indie rock band formed in Brighton, known for their catchy guitar-driven songs like 'Naive' and 'She Moves in Her Own Way'.

artists.name: Jimmy Eat World
artists.description: Jimmy Eat World is an American rock band from Arizona, famous for their melodic emo-influenced sound and songs like 'The Middle' and 'Sweetness'.

artists.name: The Wombats
artists.description: The Wombats are a British indie rock band known for their upbeat, quirky style and songs like 'Let's Dance to Joy Division'.

artists.name: The 1975
artists.description: The 1975 is a British band blending indie pop, rock, and electronic influences, known for their eclectic sound and songs like 'Love It If We Made It'.

artists.name: Anberlin
artists.description: Anberlin is an American alternative rock band from Florida, known for their melodic sound and emotionally charged lyrics, with songs like 'Feel Good Drag'.

artists.name: Three Days Grace
artists.description: Three Days Grace is a Canadian rock band known for their heavy riffs and emotional themes, with hits like 'I Hate Everything About You' and 'Animal I Have Become'.

artists.name: Kings of Leon
artists.description: Kings of Leon are an American rock band from Tennessee, blending southern rock and alternative influences, famous for songs like 'Sex on Fire' and 'Use Somebody'.

artists.name: All Time Low
artists.description: All Time Low is an American pop punk band known for their catchy hooks and energetic performances, with songs like 'Dear Maria, Count Me In'.

artists.name: Sick Puppies
artists.description: Sick Puppies are an Australian rock band known for their heavy yet melodic sound, with songs like 'You're Going Down' and 'All the Same'.

artists.name: The Weeknd
artists.description: The Weeknd is a Canadian singer-songwriter known for his dark, moody R&B and pop sound, with global hits like 'Blinding Lights' and 'Starboy'.

artists.name: Daft Punk
artists.description: Daft Punk was a French electronic music duo famous for pioneering house and electronic music with iconic albums like 'Discovery' and 'Random Access Memories'.

artists.name: The Chainsmokers
artists.description: The Chainsmokers are an American DJ and production duo known for their blend of EDM and pop, with hits like 'Closer' and 'Don't Let Me Down'.

artists.name: Korn
artists.description: Korn is an American nu metal band recognized as pioneers of the genre, with heavy riffs and dark themes in songs like 'Freak on a Leash'.

artists.name: Young the Giant
artists.description: Young the Giant is an American indie rock band known for their melodic sound and songs like 'Cough Syrup' and 'My Body'.
